cross_training_opportunities: Pair programming on Transactional Outbox and resilience patterns.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required for core NestJS skills.
cost_optimization: Current team is lean and efficient.
future_scaling: At 96% utilization, adding one more Mid-level developer is recommended for the next phase.

cross_training_opportunities: Developers to write more comprehensive integration tests to offload QA.
contractor_augmentation_option: A part-time automation QA could accelerate E2E test suite development.
cost_optimization: Sufficient for now, but a single point of failure.
future_scaling: Will require an additional QA resource if project scope increases by >20%.

cross_training_opportunities: Train a backend developer in basic Terraform and CI/CD pipeline management.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required unless a major infrastructure change is needed.
cost_optimization: Part-time allocation is cost-effective but introduces dependency risk.
future_scaling: Requires a dedicated DevOps resource if the number of microservices doubles.
